entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 2:38PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND HIGH FREEZING LEVELS ON TOP OF A HIGH SNOWPACK COULD PROMPT NUISANCE FLOODING THIS WEEK... Rain and warmer temperatures are expected to continue this week. With a deep snow pack in many locations, nuisance flooding could develop in parts of the region due to the rain combining with the snowmelt. Otherwise, surface conditions will become very slippery.
